_comment: LILYGO T5 Display Configuration - Edit this file with your settings

middleware._comment: Optional battery optimization: Enable this to fetch all data from a local middleware server instead of calling external APIs directly. This reduces WiFi active time from 10-15s to 1-2s per update, extending battery life from 3-5 days to 7-10 days. Only enable if you have deployed the middleware service (see middleware/MIDDLEWARE_SETUP.md).

schedule._comment: Optional power-saving schedule: Set sleep and wakeup times in 24-hour format (HH:MM) to automatically pause display updates during specified hours. Leave empty or omit to disable sleep schedule. Example: sleep at 23:00 (11 PM), wake at 06:00 (6 AM).
